Question
========
  
A research study is conducted to evaluate whether the number of children in a family has an influence on the level of  independence of the oldest child. Independence is measured on a 5 -point **Likert** scale. This is an example of:
  
Answerlist
----------
* Univariate statistics with number of children as dependent variable.
* Univariate statistics with number of children as independent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with number of children as independent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with number of children as dependent variable.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
